fields.name: South Indian Grill
fields.description: Dramatic flavours inspired by the traditional recipes of southern India.

fields.name: Gildos Italian
fields.description: The beautiful tastes of this dining experience are a discovery one only comes across a few times

fields.name: Times Square Diner
fields.description: The beautiful tastes of this dining experience are a discovery one only comes across a few times

fields.name: The Buffalo Shack
fields.description: Recipes straight from the mid-west give The Buffalo Shack meals a distinctive stand out flavour.

fields.name: Kim's Palace
fields.description: If you are planning a get together with family and friends, Kim's Palace is the ideal spot for a fun gathering. Attractive dicsounts available!

fields.name: Dragon Valley
fields.description: A la carte and buffet options available on weekdays and weekends.

fields.name: La Boulingerie
fields.description: An ideal place to meet with a friend for a coffee and pastry, don't miss out on the opportunity to visit this fabulous restaurant

fields.name: Yannik Corner
fields.description: The location and views from this gem are only the starting point of an unforgettable dining experience

fields.name: Eiffel Grand
fields.description: Set in the heart of the night scene, this restaurant fails to disappoint.

fields.name: Kamala Mountain Route
fields.description: The owner of this restarant has received so many awards it would be too difficult to recount them here. Instead, go to the resturant and see for yourself!

fields.name: Shimla View
fields.description: North Indian Cuisine is behind most of the dishes in this restaurant. Subtle flavours expound, this restaurant has a loyal clientele.

fields.name: Jaipur to Dehli
fields.description: The traditional Indian mainstays are on offer here, and they are so good you may not want to go anywhere else!

fields.name: Himalayan Sunset
fields.description: A relaxed atmosphere alongside the most amazing Indian food will tempt you to this establishment over and over!

fields.name: Al Italia
fields.description: The Pizza and Pasta on offer here are the best in the city! This establishment offers great taste and even better value.

fields.name: Florence Sights
fields.description: The owner and head chef of this restaurant hails from Florence, bringing local knowledge of the cuisine which never fails to disappoint.

fields.name: El Dorao
fields.description: All of your favourite Mexican dishes are available here, this restaurant draws a lively crowd at the weekends.

fields.name: La Cantina
fields.description: The decor is simple in contrast to the experience in this restaurant, which is heightened by the deep Mexican flavours and convivial surroundings
